author: John Doe
content: Great article! I've been following these trends and they're definitely shaping how we build applications today.

replies.author: Sarah Johnson
replies.content: Thanks John! I'm glad you found it helpful. AI integration is particularly exciting.

author: Emma Wilson
content: The section on PWAs was really insightful. We're considering implementing this for our next project.

author: Mark Stevens
content: Excellent breakdown of React Hooks! The custom hooks section was particularly useful.

author: Lisa Chen
content: This guide helped me understand API scalability much better. Thank you for the practical examples!
